main event: A civilian woman observed a tan hurricane disk at 30,000 feet traveling at very high speed.
interesting points: The object was silver in color and shaped like a saucer, approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter., The objects were blue-green lights observed moving from Southwest to Northeast at an apparent speed of about 3,000 mph., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The objects made a zigging motion in their flight path at a high rate of speed., The weather conditions were described as scattered clouds with no restriction to vision.
